statements: UPDATE ManuscriptFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great job!' WHERE manuscript_id = 1;
UPDATE ManuscriptFeedback SET comment_text = 'Keep up the good work!' WHERE manuscript_id = 2;
UPDATE ManuscriptFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great work! Keep it up.' WHERE manuscript_id = 1;
UPDATE ManuscriptFeedback SET comment_text = 'Overall good, but more information needed.' WHERE reviewer_id = 2;
UPDATE reviewers_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Good job!' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE manuscript_comments SET comment_text = 'Well written!' WHERE manuscript_id = 3;
UPDATE reviewers_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great job on the manuscript!', reviewer_name = 'Alice' WHERE feedback_id = 1
UPDATE manuscript_comments SET comment_text = 'This needs improvement.', commenter_name = 'Bob' WHERE manuscript_id = 5
UPDATE manuscript SET status = 'Accepted' WHERE manuscript_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE reviewer_feedback SET feedback_text = 'The manuscript needs more details' WHERE feedback_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE reviewer_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Good work, but please provide more details.', feedback_date = '2022-11-15' WHERE feedback_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE manuscript SET status = 'Under Review', publication_date = '2023-01-30' WHERE manuscript_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE reviewers SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
UPDATE manuscripts SET author_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE manuscript_id = 3;
UPDATE reviewers SET email = 'new_email@example.com', reviewer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
UPDATE manuscripts SET submission_date = '2022-12-31', author_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE manuscript_id = 3;
UPDATE manuscripts SET title = 'New Title', author = 'New Author' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE feedbacks SET rating = 5, comment = 'Excellent work' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE manuscripts SET title='New Title 1', author='New Author 1', abstract='Updated Abstract 1' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE manuscripts SET author='New Author 2', abstract='Updated Abstract 2', title='New Title 2' WHERE id=2;
